parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Front Suspension Track Bar Frame Bracket Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the front suspension track bar frame bracket can cause the bracket to separate from the frame, making the vehicle difficult to steer and control, increasing the risk of a crash.
symptoms: The vehicle may experience a "death wobble" or sudden loss of steering control
especially when driving at high speeds or over bumps. There may be a popping or "clunk" sound coming from under the truck when turning or going over bumps.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The drag link recall remedy, which involves welding the drag link adjuster nuts to the sleeve, can cause the vehicle to be unable to be properly aligned, leading to premature tire wear and potentially causing the vehicle to be more difficult to steer and control.
symptoms: The vehicle may experience uneven tire wear
pulling to one side
or difficulty maintaining a straight line. The drag link may need to be replaced in order to properly align the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Steering issues, including the "death wobble" and loss of steering control, can increase the risk of a crash.
symptoms: The vehicle may experience a sudden loss of steering control
especially when driving at high speeds or over bumps. There may be a loud popping or "clunk" sound coming from under the truck when turning or going over bumps.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the transmission can cause the vehicle to lose power, stall, or become stuck in gear, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: The vehicle loses power
stalls
or becomes stuck in gear
the transmission shifts erratically
the check engine warning light illuminates
and the vehicle may experience sudden loss of acceleration.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the gear shifter can cause the vehicle to shift out of park without warning, leading to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The gear shifter feels loose or falls out of the steering column
the vehicle shifts out of park without warning
the vehicle rolls away without warning.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the 4x4 system can cause the vehicle to lose traction, leading to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The 4x4 system makes a loud rattling noise
the vehicle vibrates or shakes
the vehicle loses traction
the vehicle becomes stuck in 4x4 mode.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake transmission shift interlock can cause the vehicle to shift out of park without warning, leading to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The vehicle shifts out of park without warning
the vehicle rolls away without warning
the brake transmission shift interlock warning light illuminates.
